If intelligence community personnel are disseminating classified info/docs and passing that info to "secondary sources", that's a crime. Why didn't these "original sources" lodge a complaint? Unauthorized disclosure of classified information is illegal under 18 U.S. code § 798.

As a former intelligence officer, I need to know who disclosed classified information to the whistleblower (a secondary source) and if others outside classified channels were included.  We need full transparency as outlined in @GOPLeader's questions to @SpeakerPelosi https://twitter.com/GOPLeader/status/1179778155340603392 …
